message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-end product that I think you'll really love. Would you be interested in making an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I'm not comfortable meeting you halfway. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $15000. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $13500?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm not sure I can go much lower than my previous offer. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $14500. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not comfortable going above $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?

I've made several concessions already, and I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to the product's true value. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can meet you at $14000. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not comfortable going above $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
